languages.text: {n}Голос начальника смены становится тише.{/n} "Знать бы только, кого... Наш негодяй может быть кем угодно из экипажа отсека. Если ошибемся с человеком, всю засаду провалим. Тут нужен кто-то снаружи, но неприметный".

{n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос начальника смены становится тише.{/n} "Знать бы только, кого... Наш негодяй может быть кем угодно из экипажа отсека. Если ошибемся с человеком, всю засаду провалим. Тут нужен кто-то снаружи, но неприметный".

traits.locale_text: {n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we get the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

{n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we get the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

{n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we get the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

{n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

{n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

{n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

languages.text: {n}El capataz baja la voz.{/n} «Ojalá supiera a quién confiárselo... El delincuente podría ser cualquier miembro de la tripulación de este compartimento. Si nos equivocamos de persona, la emboscada será un fracaso. Necesitamos a alguien de fuera que no llame la atención».
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capataz baja la voz.{/n} «Ojalá supiera a quién confiárselo... El delincuente podría ser cualquier miembro de la tripulación de este compartimento. Si nos equivocamos de persona, la emboscada será un fracaso. Necesitamos a alguien de fuera que no llame la atención».

languages.text: {n}シフト主任の声が小さくなった。{/n}「ただ、誰に託せばいいのかが分かればいいのですが…悪役は湾のクルーの誰か分からない。人選を間違えれば、待ち伏せが台無しになります。自分自身に注意を向けないような、外部の人物が必要です」
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}シフト主任の声が小さくなった。{/n}「ただ、誰に託せばいいのかが分かればいいのですが…悪役は湾のクルーの誰か分からない。人選を間違えれば、待ち伏せが台無しになります。自分自身に注意を向けないような、外部の人物が必要です」

languages.text: {n}领班的声音变得越来越低。{/n}“我只想知道到底哪些人可以信任……任何人都可能是那个破坏分子。要是我们选错了人，那整个计划就都泡汤了。我们得找个不会引人注意的局外人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}领班的声音变得越来越低。{/n}“我只想知道到底哪些人可以信任……任何人都可能是那个破坏分子。要是我们选错了人，那整个计划就都泡汤了。我们得找个不会引人注意的局外人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Schichtleiter senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Ich wünschte, ich wüsste, wen ich damit betrauen soll ... Unser Schurke könnte jeder aus der Crew der Bucht sein. Wenn wir die falsche Person auswählen, fliegt der ganze Hinterhalt auf. Wir brauchen jemanden von außen, der die Aufmerksamkeit nicht auf uns lenkt."
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Schichtleiter senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Ich wünschte, ich wüsste, wen ich damit betrauen soll ... Unser Schurke könnte jeder aus der Crew der Bucht sein. Wenn wir die falsche Person auswählen, fliegt der ganze Hinterhalt auf. Wir brauchen jemanden von außen, der die Aufmerksamkeit nicht auf uns lenkt."

languages.text: {n}La voix du contremaître devient presque inaudible.{/n} « J'aimerais juste savoir à qui je peux faire confiance… Le traître pourrait être n'importe lequel des membres du personnel de la baie. Si on se trompe de cible, toute cette embuscade n'aura servi à rien. Il nous faudrait plutôt quelqu'un d'extérieur, quelqu'un qui n'attirera pas l'attention. »
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du contremaître devient presque inaudible.{/n} « J'aimerais juste savoir à qui je peux faire confiance… Le traître pourrait être n'importe lequel des membres du personnel de la baie. Si on se trompe de cible, toute cette embuscade n'aura servi à rien. Il nous faudrait plutôt quelqu'un d'extérieur, quelqu'un qui n'attirera pas l'attention. »

languages.text: {n}Vardiya ustabaşının sesi giderek alçalıyor.{/n} "Keşke bu hususta kime güvenebileceğimi bilseydim... Suçlu, bölme mürettebatı arasından herhangi biri olabilir. Yanlış kişiyi seçersek tüm pusu planını mahvederiz. Bize dışarıdan öyle çok dikkat çekmeyecek birisi lazım."
languages.original_text: {n}The shift foreman's voice grows quieter.{/n} "I just wish I knew who to trust with it... Our villain could be anyone from the bay crew. If we pick the wrong person, we'll blow the whole ambush. We need someone from the outside who won't draw attention to themselves."
